document.full_text: larry ellison is famous for wanting to be in charge, so perhaps it is no surprise that when jury duty came calling, oracle's  chief executive served as the foreman.
document.title: larry ellison's latest job: jury foreman
lines_and_colors: larry ellison is famous for wanting to be in charge, so perhaps it is no surprise that when jury duty came calling, oracle's  chief executive served as the foreman.
